name: Kings of Climb Offroad Outlaws
description:
Speed, challenge, adrenaline, fun!

If you love to play side scroller hill climbing style racing games, then King of Climb is the perfect game for you. The game is using the well known gameplay but the focus is on monster truck racing feeling mainly, with very fun and challenging physics.

FEATURES :

– 15 monster truck style cars,
- Adventure mode: drive as far as you can!
- Championship: Race against real players in in Career, Last Man Standing, Time trial and Quick tour game modes
- 72 levels in Career mode, 8 Last Man Standing, and 24 Time trial levels. Lot of challenges!
– 20 levels of engine, wheel, suspension and air control upgrades for each cars for better running conditions
– Collect coins and XP points to upgrade your car, buy new cars, and unlock new levels
– Customize your favorite cars with new paint and wheels
– Use the side scroller racing controls


Enjoy the off-road hill climbing experience, and see how far you can go.

Download King of Climb Adventure and challenge your racing skills NOW!
Be the King of Hill!
